title: Input schema of the Spotlight Multi Scrapping System

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: URLs to start with (e.g., subreddit, user, channel, blog).

query.title: Query / Keywords
query.description: Optional keywords, hashtags, or search queries to filter results.

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: Max Requests per Crawl
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Maximum number of requests that can be made by this crawler.

maxCommentsDepth.title: Max Comments Depth
maxCommentsDepth.description: How deep to follow nested comments (if applicable).

sort.title: Sort
sort.description: Sorting strategy for platforms that support it (hot, new, top, rising).

timeFilter.title: Time Filter
timeFilter.description: Time filter for top posts (e.g., day, week, month, year, all).
